++ [https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7058209101586861358?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&lang=en Process Video]

[[<]]
> **Filename:** 6863.mp4, 6863.png
> **Author:** IronShears
> **License:** https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
> **Source Link:** https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7058209101586861358?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&lang=en
> **Derivative of:** Sigma-9 logo by Far2
[[/<]]
-----
Remind me not to do two huge projects in one in the period of 3 days again. Please. 

Otherwise... this turned out REALLY cool. I want to do a few broad-spectrum GoI/general concept videos so I started with this one. Not what I normally do but! Eh. Also, I have NO idea what to credit this as other than the logo because it's not really based on any one person's work and is kinda just... a general representation of an interview? If I did it wrong please let me know.

[[=]]

> **Filename:** 682+053.gif
> **Author:** IronShears
> **License:** https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
> **Source Link:** https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7058209101586861358?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&lang=en
> **Derivative of:** SCP-682 by Dr Gears and Epic Phail Spy, SCP-053 by Dr Gears
[[/<]]

I also drew a lot of extra art for this one. 
These three! Funnily enough, I actually drew these ones first. And drew them in the backward order of when they first show up in the video?  I DO know how to credit THESE.

Needed to come up with my own 173 design but I wanted to preserve the ENERGY that everyone knows and not everyone loves. Was extremely close to just drawing one of those squeezy toys but I am pretty sure those are also not CC.

For 683... This is the second time I've drawn it and at this point, I refuse to ever do it justice. I have a huge soft spot for kids and an overwhelming disgust for anything that would put them in danger so 053's story has always been upsetting. I want her to be happy at the expense of the big dumb --beluga whale-- lizard.

I don't have any fun insightful commentary about 096. I'm gonna be honest I've never really had strong feelings about it.

+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
author: IronShears
